title: Giro d’Italia Women: Elisa Longo Borghini Wins Opening Time Trial and Takes Pink
content:
Elisa Longo Borghini (Lidl-Trek) powered to the stage win and the pink jersey in the Giro d’Italia Women’s opening time trial, setting a time of 20:37 on a tricky 15.7km course in Brescia. Australia’s Grace Brown (FDJ-SUEZ) took the runner-up spot on the stage, finishing just a second down on Longo Borghini after an all-out … Continued

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Women: Elisa Longo Borghini Wins Opening Time Trial and Takes Pink on Velo.
author: sstokes
